metadata.description: This rule checks how many number of requests resulted with 401 or 403 error code and resulting appropriate prevention

logging.text: There are more than {{ctx.metadata.threshold}} Requests with ended with 401 or 403 Response code in last {{ctx.metadata.time_window}} on users

script.inline: def alarm = new HashMap(); alarm.timestamp = ctx.execution_time; alarm.message = 'There are more than {{ctx.metadata.threshold}} Requests with ended with 401 Response code in last {{ctx.metadata.time_window}}  on some users.'; alarm.result = new ArrayList(); for(def line: ctx.payload.aggregations.group_by_client_ip.buckets){if(line.doc_count >= ctx.metadata.threshold){alarm.result.add(['ip-address': line.key, 'number-of-401-or-403-response': line.doc_count])}} return ['_doc' : alarm];
